Message:
On a day like any other,
Teacher said this to me.

“Potpourri, you can do anything
you set your mind to.
You just need some
more confidence...or maybe
try lightening up a little?”

That stung a bit...
but she wasn’t wrong.

“All you need is the courage
to believe in yourself.

Why not give it a whirl
while thinking, ‘I can do this!’?”

Easier said than done...
I’m still scared of my power.
How could I ever
believe in myself...?

It was then that she placed
her hat on my head.

“Here. This is a magic hat.
With this on,
you’ll be practically bursting with
extra courage and confidence!”

A magic hat?
I was too old to believe
in things like that anymore.

It’d been so long since
I’d spoken to anyone...
my voice was trembling.
